price: (Allah abwira Sulayimani ati) “Ibi ni impano yacu; bityo ha (uwo ushatse) cyangwa wime (uwo ushatse), nta cyo uzabazwa.
arabic: هَٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمۡنُنۡ أَوۡ أَمۡسِكۡ بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: hādhā ʿaṭāunā fa-um'nun aw amsik bighayri ḥisābin
